name: part_009
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE COLLAB】hololive English -Council- and IRyS Special 3D Collab! #CouncilRyS3D [sEnjWtbnUj4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: The members of hololive English -Council- and IRyS react to Kronii's surprising performance in a tug-of-war match and prepare for the results.
Loading screen featuring the Promise logo.
The members gather on stage for the final score announcement, welcoming A-chan to assist. Kronii is declared the champion and receives a special trophy.
A-chan is left alone on stage as the others go to prepare for a live show. The video transitions back to a loading screen.

subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.english: Kronii!

subtitles.english: Wow!

subtitles.original: Already?
subtitles.english: Already?

subtitles.original: I know, it's such a shame. Aw man.
subtitles.english: I know, it's such a shame. Aw man.

subtitles.english: But to help announce the results, we're going to bring back A-chan!

subtitles.english: A-chan! Yay!

subtitles.english: So cute! A-chan!

subtitles.english: Feed me, feed me. Feed me, feed me, feed me.

subtitles.english: Okay, the championship of the very first Promise games is...

subtitles.english: Wait, can we have a drumroll?

subtitles.english: [Drumroll] Okay...

subtitles.original: Kronii! You are the winner!
subtitles.english: Kronii! You are the winner!

subtitles.original: Oh! Ouro Kronii!
subtitles.english: Oh! Ouro Kronii!

subtitles.english: She is totally unexpected!

subtitles.english: Wait, it's a surprise? Okay, this is crazy.

subtitles.english: Okay, as the championship, Kronii will be awarded a special trophy.

subtitles.english: Excuse me? I would've tried harder if I knew there was a trophy.

subtitles.english: No, no, no, only Kronii. Thank you, thank you, Kronii.

subtitles.english: Kronii has won this special Yagoo trophy!

subtitles.english: He looks good! Damn! Very nice!

subtitles.english: How cute it is, right?
